name: HOUSE HUNTED 1/2
description:
My newest game in my short "UNCANNY VALLEY" series!

Play the "first" one here- HOUSE HUNTED

Made in a week. Very short game  age with 6 endings you can get in about 15-20 minutes.

 -------------------------------------------

Filled with action packed, technicolor sequences that could rival "avatar", this sequel has it all! Love, romance, shootouts, cookouts, tense rivalries, screams, chills, thrills, 70s houses and you!

content warnings: INTENSE!!!

Buckle up.

This was an april fools joke game! BUT it is a fully finished and playable game in the uncanny valley universe!

It's very similar to house hunted, but you end up meeting a VERY different REALTOR and going on fun adventures with him. Theres also quite a bit of REAL universe lore within this game and hints of the next serious game in the series!

This was just a bit of fun for the fans and for lore hunters ^w^ Please dont take it too seriously! I turned off ratings and reviews because I know some people cant take a joke lol!

-----------

btw if you get that stupid windows firewall virus popup, please do remember its literally just an unknown developer popup and you can click run anyway. its not a virus, i get the same popup and so do my beta testers!
